sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowLeft, Star, Clock, User, CheckCircle, ChevronDown, ChevronUp, Award, BookOpen, BarChart3, User as UserIcon, Globe, Play } from 'lucide-react'; const CourseDetailsPage = () => { const { courseId } = useParams(); const [expandedModules, setExpandedModules] = useState(new Set()); const [selectedLanguage, setSelectedLanguage] = useState('English'); // Mock course data const course = { id: courseId, title: 'Agile Project Management', instructor: 'Youcef Belouz', description: 'Master Agile methodologies with Youcef Belouz\'s comprehensive course designed for modern project managers. Learn practical techniques for implementing Agile frameworks in real-world scenarios.', rating: 4.8, reviews: 125, price: 79, originalPrice: 149, duration: '10 weeks', level: 'Intermediate', enrolled: 2100, certification: 'PMI-ACP', progress: 25, modules: [ { id: 1, title: 'Module 1: Agile Fundamentals', lessons: ['Introduction to Agile', 'Agile Manifesto', 'Agile Principles'], duration: '2 hours' }, { id: 2, title: 'Module 2: Scrum Framework', lessons: ['Scrum Roles', 'Scrum Events', 'Scrum Artifacts'], duration: '3 hours' }, { id: 3, title: 'Module 3: Kanban Method', lessons: ['Kanban Principles', 'Kanban Board', 'Workflow Management'], duration: '2.5 hours' } ], benefits: [ 'Enhanced Project Success Rates', 'Improved Team Collaboration', 'Faster Time to Market', 'Better Risk Management', 'Increased Customer Satisfaction' ], reviews: [ { id: 1, author: 'Aaliyah Hassan', rating: 5, comment: 'Excellent course! The practical examples really helped me understand Agile concepts.', date: '2 days ago' }, { id: 2, author: 'Omar Khan', rating: 4, comment: 'Great content and well-structured. Highly recommended for anyone learning Agile.', date: '1 week ago' } ], countdown: { hours: 23, minutes: 45, seconds: 30 } }; const toggleModule = (moduleId) => { const newExpanded = new Set(expandedModules); if (newExpanded.has(moduleId)) { newExpanded.delete(moduleId); } else { newExpanded.add(moduleId); } setExpandedModules(newExpanded); }; const languages = ['English', 'French', 'Arabic']; return (
{/* Header */}

Course Details

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Course Image */}
Agile
{/* Course Info */}

{course.title}

{course.description}

{course.instructor}
{course.certification}
{/* Key Benefits */}

Key Benefits

{course.benefits.map((benefit, index) => (
{benefit}
))}
{/* Curriculum */}

Curriculum

{course.modules.map((module) => (
toggleModule(module.id)} >

{module.title}

{module.duration}

{expandedModules.has(module.id) ? ( ) : ( )}
{expandedModules.has(module.id) && (
    {module.lessons.map((lesson, index) => (
  • {lesson}
    • ))}
)}
))}
{/* Limited Time Offer */}

Limited Time Offer

{course.countdown.hours}
Hours
{course.countdown.minutes}
Minutes
{course.countdown.seconds}
Seconds
{/* Ratings & Reviews */}

Ratings & Reviews

{course.rating}
{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
({course.reviews} reviews)
{course.reviews.map((review) => (
{review.author}
{review.date}
{[...Array(review.rating)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
{review.comment}
))}
{/* Language Options */}

Language

{languages.map((language) => ( ))}
{/* Course Progress */}

Your Progress

{course.progress}% completed
{/* Enrollment Button */}
{/* Bottom Navigation */}
Home Courses Dashboard Profile
); }; export default CourseDetailsPage;
